mapper.select: SELECT cc.comment_id, cc.course_id, cc.user_id, cc.content, cc.created_at, cc.updated_at, cc.is_active, u.nickname, u.profile_image FROM course_comments cc JOIN users u ON cc.user_id = u.id WHERE cc.course_id = #{courseId} AND cc.is_active = TRUE ORDER BY cc.created_at DESC

SELECT cc.comment_id, cc.course_id, cc.user_id, cc.content, cc.created_at, cc.updated_at, cc.is_active, u.nickname, u.profile_image FROM course_comments cc JOIN users u ON cc.user_id = u.id WHERE cc.comment_id = #{commentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_comments (course_id, user_id, content) VALUES (#{courseId}, #{userId}, #{content})
